title: Requirements Of Getting S- Or Higher
body: I recently changed my name for the urgot rework and I just finished a game with a victory and a score of  19/9/18 . I am mastery 5 needing one more token for mastery 6, but to my surprise the grade I received was an A . This got me wondering what are the requirements of getting an S- or Higher ? I have been getting quite the decent scores such as 13/6/16(Victory) and 13/6/8(Defeat) and I got an A- for both of them . This leads me to think that assist don't matter for grades am I right Rito plz respond .

replies.body:
I feel you. The grading system seems weird, giving me S's when I don't deserve them and giving me A+'s for phenomenal games. An example: http://i.imgur.com/1WQPCsc 

I know Riot doesn't want to release the formula so we don't "game" the system, but could they at least tell us what we did wrong?

> [{quoted}](name=LargeNoob69,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cZRzs09U,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-03T19:35:54.066+0000)
>
> I feel you. The grading system seems weird, giving me S's when I don't deserve them and giving me A+'s for phenomenal games. An example: http://i.imgur.com/1WQPCsc 
> 
> I know Riot doesn't want to release the formula so we don't "game" the system, but could they at least tell us what we did wrong?

Wow you must really be a god-like Tristana ! And that idea of Riot hiding the grading formula so we don't "game" the system does makes sense . But they should at least give us some pointers if that's what they are going for .

Cs well if you are in a non-support role.

Contribute to objectives.

Do damage to others.

Ward and clear wards (high vision score).

Hit your skill shots.

Take alot of dmg but not die. 

These are all metrics that compare yourself to other players playing that champ in the same role.

There are other metrics, but those are the major ones.

We don't really have a specific formula to give, honestly.  It's really down to other players playing the same champion in that role, and how you performed.  These details are provided in our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, but there's really not more to it that I know of.  Keep doing your best, and you'll get there!
